changeOrder(this)[source]¶
this can be:

‘bring to front’: Will bring the selected item BEFORE its previous item ‘send to back’: Will put the selected item AFTER its next item

bimpy.interface.bStackBrowser module¶

class bStackBrowser(parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QWidget

A window that displays a list of stacks. Drag and drop to add a stack. Double-click to open a stack in a stack window.
